title: Bug 8142: Missing scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, the class hierarchies of the internal jars are not displayed. The message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' is shown.
OB: There is no scoped type hierarchy displayed when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
EB: I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a binary project.
2. Select a class from the project.
3. Press the F4 key.
